tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: VCF/BCF conversion, view, subset and filter VCF/BCF files.
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section ${sec_default.drop_genotypes} ${sec_default.header_only} ${sec_default.no_header} #if $sec_default.compression_level: --compression-level "${sec_default.compression_level}" #end if #if $sec_default.output_file: --output-file "${sec_default.output_file}" #end if #if str($sec_default.select_output_type) != "__none__": --output-type "${sec_default.select_output_type}" #end if #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_regions: --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" #end if #if $sec_default.regions_file: --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #end if #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_targets: --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" #end if #if $sec_default.targets_file: --targets-file "${sec_default.invert_targets_file}${sec_default.targets_file}" #end if ${sec_default.trim_alt_alleles} ${sec_default.no_update} #set values_sec_default_samples = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.samples_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_samples: --samples "${sec_default.invert_samples}${values_sec_default_samples}" #end if #if $sec_default.samples_file: --samples-file "${sec_default.invert_samples_file}${sec_default.samples_file}" #end if ${sec_default.force_samples} #if $sec_default.min_ac: --min-ac "${sec_default.min_ac}" #end if #if $sec_default.max_ac: --max-ac "${sec_default.max_ac}" #end if #set values_sec_default_apply_filters = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.apply_filters_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_apply_filters: --apply-filters "${values_sec_default_apply_filters}" #end if #if str($sec_default.select_genotype) != "__none__": --genotype "${sec_default.select_genotype}" #end if #if $sec_default.include: --include "${sec_default.include}" #end if #if $sec_default.exclude: --exclude "${sec_default.exclude}" #end if ${sec_default.known} ${sec_default.novel} #if $sec_default.min_alleles: --min-alleles "${sec_default.min_alleles}" #end if #if $sec_default.max_alleles: --max-alleles "${sec_default.max_alleles}" #end if ${sec_default.phased_exclude_phased} #if $sec_default.min_af: --min-af "${sec_default.min_af}" #end if #if $sec_default.max_af: --max-af "${sec_default.max_af}" #end if ${sec_default.uncalled_exclude_uncalled} #set values_sec_default_types_exclude_types = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.types_exclude_types_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_types_exclude_types: --types_exclude-types "${values_sec_default_types_exclude_types}" #end if ${sec_default.private_exclude_private}
## Primary Input/Outputs
$input_file > $output_file

param.help: drop individual genotype information (after subsetting if -s option set)
param.label: Drop Genotypes
param.name: drop_genotypes

param.help: print the header only/suppress the header in VCF output
param.label: Header Only
param.name: header_only

param.help: print the header only/suppress the header in VCF output
param.label: No Header
param.name: no_header

param.help: compression level: 0 uncompressed, 1 best speed, 9 best compression [-1]
param.label: Compression Level
param.name: compression_level

param.help: similar to -R but streams rather than index-jumps. Exclude regions with "^" prefix
param.label: Targets File
param.name: targets_file

param.help: inverts the query/filtering applied by Targets File
param.label: Invert Targets File
param.name: invert_targets_file

param.help: trim alternate alleles not seen in the subset
param.label: Trim Alt Alleles
param.name: trim_alt_alleles

param.help: do not (re)calculate INFO fields for the subset (currently INFO/AC and INFO/AN)
param.label: No Update
param.name: no_update

param.help: file of samples to include (or exclude with "^" prefix)
param.label: Samples File
param.name: samples_file

param.help: only warn about unknown subset samples
param.label: Force Samples
param.name: force_samples

param.help: minimum/maximum count for non-reference (nref), 1st alternate (alt1), least frequent (minor), most frequent (major) or sum of all but most frequent (nonmajor) alleles
param.label: Min Ac
param.name: min_ac

param.help: minimum/maximum count for non-reference (nref), 1st alternate (alt1), least frequent (minor), most frequent (major) or sum of all but most frequent (nonmajor) alleles
param.label: Max Ac
param.name: max_ac

option.value: require one or more hom/het/missing genotype or

param.help: select/exclude sites for which the expression is true (see man page for details)
param.label: Include
param.name: include

param.help: select/exclude sites for which the expression is true (see man page for details)
param.label: Exclude
param.name: exclude

param.help: select known/novel sites only (ID is not/is '.')
param.label: Known
param.name: known

param.help: select known/novel sites only (ID is not/is '.')
param.label: Novel
param.name: novel

param.help: minimum/maximum number of alleles listed in REF and ALT (e.g. -m2 -M2 for biallelic sites)
param.label: Min Alleles
param.name: min_alleles

param.help: minimum/maximum number of alleles listed in REF and ALT (e.g. -m2 -M2 for biallelic sites)
param.label: Max Alleles
param.name: max_alleles

param.help: select/exclude sites where all samples are phased
param.label: Phased/Exclude Phased
param.name: phased_exclude_phased

param.help: minimum/maximum frequency for non-reference (nref), 1st alternate (alt1), least frequent (minor), most frequent (major) or sum of all but most frequent (nonmajor) alleles
param.label: Min Af
param.name: min_af

param.help: minimum/maximum frequency for non-reference (nref), 1st alternate (alt1), least frequent (minor), most frequent (major) or sum of all but most frequent (nonmajor) alleles
param.label: Max Af
param.name: max_af

param.help: select/exclude sites without a called genotype
param.label: Uncalled/Exclude Uncalled
param.name: uncalled_exclude_uncalled

param.help: select/exclude comma-separated list of variant types: snps,indels,mnps,other [null]
param.label: Types_Exclude Types
param.name: types_exclude_types

param.help: select/exclude sites where the non-reference alleles are exclusive (private) to the subset samples
param.label: Private/Exclude Private
param.name: private_exclude_private
